title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the Continuous Feedback Loop system, including desired features, user roles, integration with existing systems, data privacy and security considerations, scalability and performance requirements, and any other relevant constraints or assumptions.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the Continuous Feedback Loop system, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the Continuous Feedback Loop system, including feedback submission, viewing, and management.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services for the Continuous Feedback Loop system, including data storage, processing, and integration with other systems.

title: Set up Data Storage
description: Design and implement the data storage solution for the Continuous Feedback Loop system, including database schema and data access layer.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Design and implement security measures for the Continuous Feedback Loop system, including user authentication, authorization, and data protection.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure and implement a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the Continuous Feedback Loop system, including build automation, testing, and deployment to production.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Design and implement a comprehensive test suite for the Continuous Feedback Loop system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create user and technical documentation for the Continuous Feedback Loop system, including installation guides, user manuals, and API documentation.
